channel.title: Can i make a private server without a static ip?
channel.description: ok so i tried to make a static ip and it screwed up my dns servers and shut down the interent for my entire street 0.0 can i make a server without a static ip? and if yes. can someone please explain to me what im supose to do with utoreent and no-ip etc.?

item.title: Can i make a private server without a static ip?
item.dc:creator: @Pingu001 Pingu001
item.description:
@Pingu001 wrote:

ok… so i sohuld use no-ip and do wat?? can u send me the source/cleint u use and please explain to me what to do? i hav a no-ip, ip and… i need someone to tell me what to do with it. also wat to do with the port 43594…

Read full topic

item.source: Can i make a private server without a static ip?

item.title: Can i make a private server without a static ip?
item.dc:creator: @I_need_a_username I need a username
item.description:
@I_need_a_username wrote:

Utorrent is used to portworward, or open a port (in this case 43594)… You dont need it
No-ip is used to Hide your ip (instead of #.#.#.# its yourserver@no-ip.org)… You dont need it
but of course you can use them to make life easyer ^.^
All you need is open port 43594, and go to Ipchicken.com, copy those numbers and add them to your client
so that anyone who logs on your client, will go to your ip, and go through port 43594, and connect to your sever

Read full topic
item.source: Can i make a private server without a static ip?

item.title: Can i make a private server without a static ip?
item.dc:creator: @ravens ravens
item.description:
@ravens wrote:

just make a no-ip, google no-ip sign up on their website and download no-ip duc and it will make a static IP for you and you can choose the name, like moparscape.no-ip.biz or something. then if you have the no-ip client open (it can work in the background on your toolbar also) and you have signed in and turned on the static ip it will work. GL ;D

Read full topic
